text: jab tum unake paas (jihaad se laut kar) vaapas aaoge to ye (munaaphiqeen) tumase (tarah tarah) kee maazarat karenge (ai rasool) tum kah do ki baaten na banao ham haragiz tumhaaree baat na maanenge (kyonki) hame to khuda ne tumhaare haalaat se aagaah kar diya hai anaqeerab khuda aur usaka rasool tumhaaree kaarastaanee ko mulaahaza pharamaegen phir tum zaahir va baatin ke jaanane vaalon (khuda) kee huzooree mein lauta die jaoge to jo kuchh tum (duniya mein) karate the (zarra zarra) bata dega
